name: Tenzin Gate - Battle for Arakun
description: Tenzin Gate - Battle for Arakun is a skirmish level game involving Dreadnoughts - 30ft walking weapons of war.  Players do battle on the sands of Arakun in a tug-of-war style engagement. Each destruction of an enemy gains you a Victory Point - and you need 7 to win... but you may also spend your points to replenish your units every round. Players must decide if they are wiling to give up the points they have earned in order to push their opponent into defeat, or risk them gaining the advantage.
